attributes.additional_details:
Boris Johnson has made the rule of 6 law inside and out including children in England, how is it safe for schools to remain open and children being confined in the classroom with 30 other children so that is 30 different households mixing.
These may only be children and just numbers to the government like they dont matter so they can be sent off to school like lab rats, but these children matter to us their familys who want nothing bad to happen to them.
attributes.background: Take another look at whether school are as safe as they are telling us and close the schools till they find a way of reducing the amount of different houses mixing to keep in with the new law that has put in place.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846
